clean_faucet_base.description: Wipe the base of the faucet to maintain its hygiene.

finish_cleaning_faucet_base.description: Finish cleaning task related to the faucet base.

move_stem.description: Move the stem of the faucet to adjust the water flow.

clean_stem.description: Clean the stem of the faucet to avoid any blockages.

finish_adjusting_stem.description: Finish task related to adjustment of the faucet's stem.

rotate_stem.description: Rotate the stem of the faucet to control the water flow.

wipe_stem.description: Clean the stem of the faucet to keep it shining and functional.

clean_entire_faucet.description: Clean the complete faucet including the stem and base to keep it shining.

finish_faucet_tasks.description: Finish all tasks related to the faucet.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including the stem and base of the faucet.
